Constructor Detail

HyperLinkButton

public HyperLinkButton(java.awt.Image alinkImg,
                       java.awt.Image raisedImg,
                       java.awt.Image grayedImg)
Creates an instance of the HyperLinkButton class to create a button widget to place in the GUI.
Parameters:
alinkImg:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the button is clicked.
raisedImg:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the user positions the mouse over the hyperlink button.
grayedImage:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the button is inactive, the user does not have the mouse button over or pressed on the button.

HyperLinkButton

public HyperLinkButton(java.awt.Image alinkImg,
                       java.awt.Image raisedImg,
                       boolean brighten,
                       int grayScale)
Creates an instance of the HyperLinkButton class to create a button widget to place in the GUI.
Parameters:
alinkImg:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the button is clicked.
raisedImg:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the user positions the mouse over the hyperlink button.
brighten - a boolean value of true if the pixels should be brightened on the grayed image.
grayScale - is an int in the range 0..100 that determines the percentage of gray, where 100 is the darkest gray, and 0 is the lightest.

HyperLinkButton

public HyperLinkButton(java.awt.Image alinkImg,
                       java.awt.Image raisedImg)
Creates an instance of the HyperLinkButton class to create a button widget to place in the GUI.
Parameters:
alinkImg:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the button is clicked.
raisedImg:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the user positions the mouse over the hyperlink button.
grayedImage:Ljava.awt.Image - is the icon used when the button is inactive, the user does not have the mouse button over or pressed on the button.
